summary: QA Automation Engineer with 2 years of experience in test automation seeking to transition to DevOps. Strong programming skills in Python and experience with CI/CD pipelines from the testing perspective. Familiar with Docker and AWS from QA automation work. Eager to expand infrastructure and deployment automation skills.

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
responsibilities: Develop and maintain automated test suites using Python and Selenium
Write integration tests for microservices using Pytest
Integrate automated tests into Jenkins CI/CD pipelines
Set up test environments using Docker containers
Perform API testing using Postman and Python requests library
Collaborate with developers to improve testability and code coverage

experience.title: Manual QA Tester
responsibilities: Performed manual testing for web and mobile applications
Wrote test cases and documented bugs in Jira
Participated in agile ceremonies and sprint planning
